sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: Extension Study Of Long-Term Safety And Efficacy Of Pregabalin As Monotherapy (Lyrica) In Patients With Partial Seizures
officialTitle: An Open-Label Multicenter Extension Study To Determine Long Term Safety And Efficacy Of Pregabalin (Lyrica) As Monotherapy In Patients With Partial Seizures
summary: This study will evaluate the long term safety and efficacy of pregabalin (Lyrica) when administered by itself (without any other anti-epileptic medication) to epilepsy patients for the treatment of partial seizures. This is an extension study to a previous clinical trial.
